entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
